name: quixit-backend
description: Backend server made with Node JS and Express for Quixit app
author: Guillaume Savy

scripts.reset: npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && clear && yarn server
scripts.reset:prod: npx heroku run knex migrate:rollback -a quixit-app && npx heroku run knex migrate:latest -a quixit-app && npx heroku run knex seed:run -a quixit-app
